name: 2021 4th International Conference on Big Data Technologies
content: Publication： The accepted paper will be included into ICBDT 2021 Conference Proceedings (ISBN Number：978-1-4503-8509-1), which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
